food.question: I am yellow and curved, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💛 I am the color of sunshine.
🥄 You peel my skin before you eat me.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. I'm good in cereal and make bones strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am often served cold.
🐄 You can get me from an animal.
💪 I help make your bones strong.

food.question: I am long and orange and bunnies love to munch me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 A furry animal loves to eat me.
🥕 I'm a root vegetable.
🧡 I am often the color of a pumpkin.

food.question: I am round and can be red, green, or yellow. I grow on trees, and an apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree.
🍎 I'm a popular fruit.
🩺 Eating me is supposedly good for your health.

food.question: I am a type of food you can spread on toast, and bees help make me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 Little flying creatures help make me.
🍞 People love to put me on bread.
🍯 I am very sweet.

food.question: I am made from potatoes, and I am long, thin, and crispy. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am often served with ketchup.
🥔 I am made from a vegetable.
😋 I am a popular snack.

food.question: I am a dessert that is cold and sweet. I come in many flavors, and you often eat me in a cone or a bowl. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a cold treat.
🌈 I come in many colors and flavors.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me, or I may be in a cone.

food.question: I am a small, round fruit that grows in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple and sometimes turn into raisins. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in a cluster.
☀️ I can be dried to make a snack.
🍷 Some drinks are made from me.

food.question: I am a food made from flour and water. You can put many toppings on me, like cheese and tomato sauce. I am usually baked in an oven, and I am often cut into slices. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I am from Italy.
🧀 One of my most common toppings is cheese.
🍕 I can be shared among many people.

food.question: I am a grain that is often eaten at breakfast. I can be cooked in milk or water, and I can be sweet or savory. I come in many types, like rolled, steel-cut, or instant. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 I'm a common breakfast food.
🌾 I am a type of grain.
💧 You can add water or milk when preparing me.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and fluffy. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm cold!
🌨️ You can make snowballs with me.
☃️ I cover the ground in winter.

weather.question: I'm hot and yellow and shine in the sky. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I appear during the day.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 I give light to the Earth.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I'm a beautiful arc.
💧 You need sunshine and rain to see me.
🔴 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky. You might need an umbrella when I come around. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ I can make puddles.
🌱 I help flowers grow.
🌧️ I can be a drizzle or a downpour.

weather.question: I'm white and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain or snow. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like fluffy animals.
🌑 I can block the sun.
☁️ I'm made of water droplets or ice crystals.

weather.question: I rumble and flash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am bright!
🔊 You can hear me boom!
⛈️ I come with rain and strong winds.

weather.question: I'm a strong wind that spins around and around. I can be very dangerous. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can lift things up in the air.
🏠 You need to take shelter when I'm around.
🌀 My name starts with a 'T'.

weather.question: I am tiny frozen raindrops. I bounce when I hit the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I'm like ice but smaller.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you!
🥚 I can sometimes look like little balls.

weather.question: I'm a very strong storm over the ocean with a swirling eye. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have strong winds and heavy rain.
🌀 I form over warm ocean waters.
🌴 I often hit coastal areas.

weather.question: I am a period of very cold weather with lots of snow and strong winds. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ You'll need a very warm coat!
❄️ Schools often close when I arrive.
🌨️ I can make it hard to see.
